title: Steak pasty
description: Try the Hairy Biker's recipe for a classic steak pasty - these are great to make ahead for a party or picnic.
ingredients: 225g/½lb plain flour, plus extra for dusting
150g/5½oz potato, peeled and cut into cubes
100g/3½oz rib-eye steak, cut into small pieces
salt and freshly ground black pepper
